events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your details shortly.
Your application has been categorised under Engineering based on your experience as a developer and software skills listed.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will contact you soon for the initial screening.
The initial screening interview went well, and we discussed your background in software development in detail.
Thank you for your positive feedback after the screening interview; we appreciate your enthusiasm for the role.
We have scheduled your technical interview for next week, focusing on coding and system design skills.
Your technical interview was completed successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding abilities.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the company culture, benefits, and your further questions about the role.
The HR interview went smoothly, and you expressed great interest in joining our engineering team.
We are pleased to propose a job offer for the Software Engineer role with a competitive salary and benefits package.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and are enthusiastic about the opportunity to contribute to our engineering projects.
You have accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to development tools and introductory meetings with the software team.
The hiring process is now closed. Congratulations on joining our engineering department; we look forward to your contributions.
